```{r}
#| eval: false
landuse <- st_read(dsn = "data/Data_geospatial/", layer = "FYP_target_landuse_AMK_1")
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
plot(st_geometry(landuse))
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
tm_shape(landuse) +
  tm_borders() +
  tm_layout(legend.position = c("left", "bottom"))
```
